Response: "This debate can't be about 'both sides' when the very foundations of systemic racism are at play. "I wholeheartedly agree with Layla. We cannot pretend that both parties are equally culpable when one side has historically wielded power to maintain a system of oppression. It's time for a reckoning and real action – not empty apologies or half-hearted reform."

"Layla, I couldn't agree more. If we truly want to dismantle systemic racism, we must ensure that those responsible face justice that reflects the depth of their crimes. "It's stunning to me that we're having this conversation in the year 2024, yet we still have systemic racism entrenched in our institutions.
